website_summaries.verdict: Wonder Woman’s shield never launched projectiles, but this bonus feature makes this golden gem the best toy accessory for imaginative little superheroes.
pros: Launches plastic discs up to 22 feet
Excellent accessory for pretending to be the Amazon warrior
cons: Only give a disc-shooting toy to a responsible kid

customer_reviews.title: Careful - disks shoot out really fast!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my niece to go along with her Wonder Woman costume. This shield is great, HOWEVER, be warned that the disks shoot out really, really fast. The first time she shot it no one knew to be extra careful and she almost took her sister's head off. Definitely have to make sure no people, glass or expensive electrons get hit with these. So I'd only recommend for a child who can be trusted to play by the rules.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus E Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My girls are greatly enjoying these shields. The shooting disks are really cool but three were lost in the first battle with their cousins and based on other reviews not the most easily replaced. Detracting a star for the lack of discs. This is a great buy, a lot of fun, seems fairly sturdy, shoots well without issues, shoots FAST & HARD so not for inside use. Even if your daughter isn't a big WW fan but likes to have Nerf wars this would be a good addition to the arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: jersey_gray

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this! My 4-year old picked this out to go with her Halloween costume and it's the perfect size. Might be a little small for anyone over 8. The handle isn't too difficult to squeeze to shoot the stars (which eject with a surprising amount of force, I might add) and it is fully adjustable. It's been through the ringer so far and has held up superbly well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: It's a really well made toy and super sturdy. The discs catch sometimes but it's understandable ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really well made toy and super sturdy. The discs catch sometimes but it's understandable with the design. My 3 year old loves it (she is the size of a 4 year old .) I was amazed that it actually shoots fairly accurately. It does sting a little to get shot with the disc but perfect opportunity to teach gun safety. No aiming at living beings and no pointing the opening at yourself... Especially the face.
customer_reviews.author: Dragoness

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Our son has a captain america one, so we needed one for our daughter. She loves it, but since they are still young and sometimes make bad decisions, we took away the disks. So it is just a shield for now, but works great. They go in many adventures together sometimes against me. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discs shoot too hard
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loved this but the discs shoot out pretty hard. She kept aiming them at our faces so I had to take them before one of us lost an eye lol. Otherwise it’s cute and perfect size for a 5 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a convention and I had no idea it was a disc shooter! MADE ME LOVE IT MORE!!! I'll be the awesome-est Wonder Woman (and possibly the oldest...ugh...) at the Kon! I'm still tempted to go outside to shoot one in the air now just so I can bounce it off the shield! Honestly, I was just looking for a DC Girls look in a Wonder Woman shield but what I bought was way cooler than I expected, let alone set out to find in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Chris Androgenous

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 5 year old niece for Christmas and she loved it! It shoots surprisingly well, but on the flip side you have to be careful not to shoot anyone in the face because it has some force behind it. It was too hard for my neice to open the shield to put the discs back in every time, so she had to have someone do it for her, but older kids won't have a problem. This is a great toy for any Wonder Woman lover! I even enjoyed playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shield and excellant quality
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old son thought this was fun, my 70 year old father and my 5 year old daughter whom I bought it for LOVES it! Excellent quality and great investment. We are buying a few more to let everyone shoot the disks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as part of a Halloween outfit and ended up being fun every day. Caution though, the discs shoot out very far and do hurt if almost point blank.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so much fun. I got it for a Christmas present for my daughter. I was surprised how much power the little flying discs have. We lost one almost immediately and I worry that someone is going to get hit in the face with one of these little discs. . still its a lot of fun to aim at thing and play with..
customer_reviews.author: Terarhea

customer_reviews.title: Cute addition
customer_reviews.text: A cute addition to a Wonder Woman outfit I bought for my granddaughter. I wished it was a little larger but okay for her playing.
customer_reviews.author: jet5657

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter Loved this - it it so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great toy, just as described. It shot the discs quite far. It was sturdy enough to survive a birthday weekend and is still working! I wish there were more discs in the package but I'm pleased. I'm planning on purchasing another for my other granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Toni B

customer_reviews.title: Need more ammo!
customer_reviews.text: With only 5 shootings discs, and a 6 year old, we now have a really nice shield. Which is cool in and of itself, but it reduces the value of the item greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Finisterre

customer_reviews.title: Great construction; a little too powerful shooter
customer_reviews.text: So cute and well crafted from hearty plastic. Only concern is that the discs come blazing out so fast it could do some damage if it hits someone. This quickly became an outside only shooting toy and finally just took the discs away.
customer_reviews.author: Doni Kay Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Fun For All
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 5 year old niece who loves Wonder Woman. She had a blast shooting the discs at things and even the adults loved playing with it. It is made pretty well, but the discs are easy to loose since they are so small and if you don't really pay attention to where they go. I think this would be a great gift for any little girl that is into superheroes.
customer_reviews.author: Gina V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter who loves Wonder Woman. I am very excited to give it to her. The product looks sturdy and badass
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for little kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a preschooler who loves Wonder Woman. I had to take the disks out of it- they come out hard and fast and I’m worried she’ll hurt someone. It’s cute, it’s a fun toy, but check the spring loaded action on it before you unleash your children with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stockbridge

customer_reviews.title: Daughter is happy
customer_reviews.text: I would've preferred something that didn't shoot things, but it's holding up fine so far
customer_reviews.author: Nmdfamily

customer_reviews.title: Bang bang
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy for my 4 year old. The top that holds the discs is too hard for her to open but she can activate the trigger just fine. They shoot about 20feet or so most of the time and my kids has a blast
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: my little niece Loves it. She won't stop playing with it. This year for Halloween she is going to be a wonderwmen.
customer_reviews.author: denny

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works and went well with my daughters Halloween outfit. She loves shooting the discs!
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece for Christmas and she loved it. Her brother had a Captain America shield so I could not leave her out of the fun. Also bought the wristbands as an accessory, huge hit. The discs are small and if you do not pay attention where they fly off to when you shoot them, they will be hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Coppock

customer_reviews.title: okay product
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loved this. it was very hard to get the discs in though. I had trouble loading it as an adult, so my toddler definitely couldn't
customer_reviews.author: Carlyn Slater

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and my toddler loves it! Also this was a hit with her wonder woman costume this year.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Although she got in trouble pretty quickly for shooting the disks at people
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! I have a small Captain America shield for my kids and got this for my niece, it's double the size! She loves it! Although she got in trouble pretty quickly for shooting the disks at people... But oh well! not my kid not my problem haha
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: ... obsessed with wonder woman but the products are often super girly, this sheild is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with wonder woman but the products are often super girly, this sheild is perfect for him, he loves shooting the little stars! Only wish it was a little bit easier to open the compartment that stores the stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: We had the best time playing disc shoot st my daughters super hero party. The shield held up amazing and all the kids wanted one by the end!
customer_reviews.author: KGROW

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 yr. old granddaughter for her birthday along with a bow and arrow set. We love to play super heroes in my large backyard. The discs that come with it don't really hurt as much as some other reviews said. Maybe they were too close to shoot. But we really have fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Engelbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This shield was a big hit playing super hero! The kids have a blast with it! It's just really hard for them to open the top to put the discs back in.
customer_reviews.author: beckyms78

customer_reviews.title: Shots out fast
customer_reviews.text: It very well made but it does shoot fast and it dies hurt
customer_reviews.author: marisela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES This! You life the red disc, and drop in the small coin-like discs to reload. My daughter is 6 and can easily do it herself. It's an awesome purchase for the Wonder Woman fan!
customer_reviews.author: KRJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very durable
customer_reviews.text: Again love this, just wish I could find if you could order more disks as my lo has lost some. But still perfect to play with even without them!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C. Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Daughter really think she’s wonder woman now she loves this product
customer_reviews.text: Daughter really think she’s wonder woman now she loves this product
customer_reviews.author: Bryan E Castle

customer_reviews.title: Cool but be careful where you shoot it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Wonder Woman so she loves this toy. The little red things it shoots out are hard and will break things.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Woosley

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift for my granddaughter. She LOVES ...
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my granddaughter. She LOVES this thing. It shoots out 5 discs. Make sure they shoot at some sort of target as they come out fast and can damage your wall.
customer_reviews.author: karen1

customer_reviews.title: Hit for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old used this with her Wonder Girl/Woman costume for Halloween. The disk set up and strength it took to shoot the disks was a little hard for her but she got it down quickly and was soon defending our street from 'bad guys'. This is surprisingly sturdy plastic and isn't flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: MiyazakiFan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderwomen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves wonderwomen an has been asking for this . She plays wonderwomen all the time .
customer_reviews.author: Rex Atchley

customer_reviews.title: NOT for Smaller Girls
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my almost 4 year old niece for Xmas. She loved the shield but it was hard for her to grab the handle and shoot the discs out without help. Also, those discs will probably take no time at all to get lost. Overall, great product for price.
customer_reviews.author: LRo3

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: worked well, and great price. Little girl loved it, although she did break the handle off right away, but it clips back on. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lisa martinez

customer_reviews.title: Girls are great warriors too.
customer_reviews.text: They love it. Their mom and dad day put it up for later. I say let them play. As long as they are under supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shield!
customer_reviews.text: My Wonder Woman loving kiddo is so happy with this shield! Its adjustable for arm size and the discs shoot far!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: As another customer said, the little disks fly fast and far. I gave my daughter one at a time which helped. My only other complaint is that it's hard to open. My daughter doesn't close it all the way so she can reload it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this for my daughter for Christmas. It’s cracked in a bunch of areas and it won’t shoot the stars. I’d rate this a zero if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! And I can attest, this is a pretty fun toy :)
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Looks as picture
customer_reviews.text: This product looks just as picture pretty Heavy my daughter was excited to get it
customer_reviews.author: Ernest1415

customer_reviews.title: this toy could be dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: the flying disks are kind of dangerous. they shoot out hard and fast. Accidents happen. we loaded it and shot it in the office and it hit so hard it dented the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a fun little toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 5-year-old daughter who loves Wonder Woman. It's a fun little toy, but take care as the disks shoot out pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: K. Aaron Vanoosterhout

customer_reviews.title: Discs shoot far, but good sized shield
customer_reviews.text: Shield is perfect size for my 5year old daughter. But, be careful, as the discs are made of a thin, yet sturdy plastic and fly very far. My dog sitting on the far side of the living room got a good scare when the disc came flying from the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nekita G

customer_reviews.title: Very fun toy - 5 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is great. The discs shoot out fast - so make sure you put your breakables away - or send your kid outside.
customer_reviews.author: jumperoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The shield is cool. Fires well. Somewhat hard to hold for my 5 year old girl but she manages.

customer_reviews.title: It takes a bit of strength to open the lid and pull the trigger
customer_reviews.text: Our child loved it just her only being 4 she had troubles at first trying to pull open the lid to load the disk and then pulling the trigger but she figured out a way of doing both after a bit She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, fits pretty big on her tiny arm but she loves to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: lje122cmt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves this shield and has figured out how to load the stars with just a little bit of practice. Good quality product as well!

customer_reviews.title: good

customer_reviews.title: Cute shield
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter liked this, and that's all that counts! It was slightly bigger than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: The "shooters" actually come out fast and can sting if hit in the face or arms so not recommended your younger kids
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old loves this shield. The "shooters" actually come out fast and can sting if hit in the face or arms so not recommended your younger kids. It's super cute and completes an outfit!
customer_reviews.author: norma rivera

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and seems like good quality. Only 4 stars because the small disks are plastic and come out of the shield so hard that's it's dangerous. I can't let my kids use the disks and shoot it or someone will get hurt.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 y/o daughter loves this toy shield and she also loves to shoot us with the little plastic discs. I'm surprise at how far they fly. Hasn't broken and seems to be of decent quality.

customer_reviews.title: DC Super Hero Girls Wonder Woman Shield
customer_reviews.text: Great shield! My daughter loves it. lost the disks quickly, was thinking on trying to use poker chips as replacement disks...

customer_reviews.title: Great find and buy!

customer_reviews.title: Okay

customer_reviews.title: These go FAR... Fun!

customer_reviews.title: You'll want this for your Wonder Woman costume

customer_reviews.title: The whole family enjoys playing with it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toy for Your Young Wonder Woman!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old niece LOVED this gift. It is well made the the shooting discs make it way more fun for her.

customer_reviews.title: Great present

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I imagined!

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter absolutely LOVES this. She has a blast shooting it. I wish there were more disks as they shoot a long way & will be lost easily. It goes with her Halloween costume perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, just watch out for the stars.

product_meta.title: Mattel DC Super Hero Girls Wonder Woman Shield, Standard
product_meta.description:
Inspired by the soon-to-be-released story of teenagers with super powers in high school, girls can explore their inner heroes with this role play item that allows them to find the wonder in hero gadgetry. The iconic and wearable utility piece has an easily activated feature that lets imaginations soar.

BRAND STORY
By DC Comics
feature_bullets: Be your own Super Hero with this role-play set inspired by the Wonder Woman shield as seen in DC Super Hero Girls!
The golden shield with iconic emblem launches plastic discs with the push of a button - up to 22 feet!
With a diameter of 11.75 inches, the plastic shield is designed to be worn on kids' forearms - just like Wonder Woman
Five plastic discs are included to keep the action moving
Play out the stories, adventures and heroism inherent to one of the world's most preeminent heroes-in-training

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars720 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
